Author: tofu_snob
Text: Vomiting or diarrhea will always dehydrate somebody to a degree, I do think it feels worse with chronic bulimia. I get really bad hypoglycemia from purging too.

Author: NicolasXage
Text: Yes!! I always make it worse by having something really salty after I purge like a spoon of Vegemite or like a stock cube soup .
